nodes.documentation:
@title Migration contract for VotingTokens.
@dev Handles migrating token holders from one token to the next.
nodes.name: TokenMigrator

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct FixedPoint.Unsigned memory,struct FixedPoint.Unsigned memory) pure returns (struct FixedPoint.Unsigned memory)

nodes.name: migrateTokens

nodes.documentation:
@title Migration contract for VotingTokens.
@dev Handles migrating token holders from one token to the next.
nodes.name: TokenMigrator

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct FixedPoint.Unsigned memory,struct FixedPoint.Unsigned memory) pure returns (struct FixedPoint.Unsigned memory)

nodes.name: migrateTokens

devdoc.details: Handles migrating token holders from one token to the next.

constructor.details: This function triggers the snapshot upon which all migrations will be based.

params._newToken: the address of the token being migrated to.
params._oldToken: the address of the token being migrated from.
params._rate: the number of old tokens it takes to generate one new token.

migrateTokens(address).details: This function can only be called once per `tokenHolder`. Anyone can call this method on behalf of any other token holder since there is no disadvantage to receiving the tokens earlier.

devdoc.title: Migration contract for VotingTokens.

migrateTokens(address).notice: Migrates the tokenHolder's old tokens to new tokens.
